clues.1: A term often associated with fire and formation
clues.2: Its name is derived from a Latin term for 'fire'
clues.3: Refers to a type of rock formed from cooled magma or lava
clues.4: Its classification includes intrusive and extrusive types
clues.5: Contrasts with a type of rock formed by sediment deposition
clues.6: Its influence can be seen in various landforms
